sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-checkbox', templateUrl: './checkbox.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkbox.component.css'], }) export class CheckboxComponent implements OnInit { /** * @description: */ @Input() public state: boolean = false; /** * @description: */ public isMultiple: boolean = false; @Input() public type: 'checkbox' | 'checkbox_circle' = 'checkbox'; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} public toggleState(): void { this.state = !this.state; } }
